KPlugin.Description: Darkens the entire screen when requesting root privileges

KPlugin.Description[ca]: Enfosqueix tota la pantalla en demanar privilegis d'administrador

KPlugin.Description[en_GB]: Darkens the entire screen when requesting root privileges
